resources.string: Fun Bricks - Brick Game content rating is Everyone. This app is listed in Puzzle category of app store . You could visit Dat Viet Entertainments website to know more about the company/developer who developed this. Fun Bricks - Brick Game can be downloaded and installed on android devices supporting 16 api and above.. Download the app using your favorite browser and click on install to install the app. Please note that we provide original and pure apk file and provide faster download speed than Fun Bricks - Brick Game apk mirrors. Versions of this app apk available with us: 2.2.3 , 2.2.2 , 2.2.1 , 2.2.0 , 2.1.2. You could also download apk of Fun Bricks - Brick Game and run it using popular android emulators.
